name: @saeon/doi-resolver

scripts.start: nodemon --ext js,graphql,json --watch ./src --exec 'prettier --write "src/**/*.@(js|json|graphql)" && NODE_ENV=development TZ=utc node --no-warnings --experimental-json-modules src'

author: zach@saeon.ac.za
